translation.Message_0_Page_0: I do not believe so. In which case, Hello. I am Isch. An admiral of the Coalition forces you helped contact, I've definitely heard good things about you from around the island, and I'm glad to see that you're recovering.
translation.Message_1_Page_0: Well, I can reintroduce myself. I am Isch. An admiral of the Coalition forces you helped contact, I've definitely heard good things about you from around the island, and I'm glad to see that you're recovering.
